text: Miklós Fodor (September 3, 1908 - April 30, 1997) was a Hungarian field handball player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Hungarian field handball team, which finished fourth in the Olympic tournament. He played four matches. ==References== ==External links== *profile Category:1908 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Field handball players at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Hungary
title: Miklós Fodor
